title: A Polynomial Weyl Invariant Spinning Membrane Action
abstract: A review of the construction of a Weyl-invariant spinning-membrane action that is $polynomial$ in the fields, without a cosmological constant term, comprised of quadratic and quartic-derivative terms, and where supersymmetry is linearly realized, is presented. The action is invariant under a $modified$ supersymmetry transformation law which is derived from a new $ Q + K + S $ sum-rule based on the 3D-superconformal algebra .
